Text:
My prayers have been answered! as far as rippers adding a second audio track as Director/Cast commentary. Since all commentary tracks are 2ch, they end up being tiny insignificant files sizes, so they should be default for all Blu-ray's from now on.

Thanks for this, but awaiting the 1080p version!
As mentioned, thank you for including the commentary track!
